generated_text:
"Module 41: CV" (22 minutes, Beginner)
In this lab, create a professional CV. Follow along as we:
- Set up a template
- Add contact info and objective
- List education and experience
Practice building your own CV with guided steps.

mcqs.question: What is the main objective of Module 41?
What is one of the steps in creating a CV in Module 41?

flashcards.back: Curriculum Vitae, a document that outlines education, experience, and skills
A pre-designed format used to create a document, in this case, a CV
